thread.title: Irritated Luis Enrique snaps at reporter following Barcelona's humiliating 4-0 defeat to Paris Saint-Germain
thread.title_full: Irritated Luis Enrique snaps at reporter following Barcelona's humiliating 4-0 defeat to Paris Saint-Germain

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Irritated Luis Enrique snaps at reporter following Barcelona's humiliating 4-0 defeat to Paris Saint-Germain
text:
Get FC Barcelona   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
An irritated Luis Enrique snapped at a Spanish reporter following Barcelona 's humiliating 4-0 Champions League defeat to Paris Saint-Germain. 
PSG came out all guns blazing in the last 16 first leg, and took the lead after 18 minutes through a superb Angel di Maria free-kick. 
Les Parisiens then doubled their lead just before half-time after January signing Julian Draxler powered his effort past Marc-Andre ter Stegen. 
And whatever Enrique said at half-time clearly fell on deaf ears as it was normal service resumed for the second 45. Luis Enrique fumes from the touchline (Photo: AFP) 
It took 10 minutes for the home side to score again, di Maria doubling his night's tally. 
And things took an even worse turn for the visitors as Uruguay international Edinson Cavani made it four for the Parc des Princes side. Luis Enrique loses his cool during his post-match interview 
Having received criticism after the game, a disgruntled Enrique said: "I accept all the responsibility for the loss, but when we win I expect the same personal manner when I conduct my interviews with you, OK?" 
The Spaniard then stormed off. 
Barcelona do have a shot at redemption on March 8 - but they'll have their work cut out. poll loading Who will win the Champions League? 1000+ VOTES SO FAR
